PurchDate.description: The date when the vehicle was purchased, represented in Unix timestamp

VehYear.description: The year the vehicle was manufactured

VehOdo.description: The odometer reading of the vehicle

MMRAcquisitionAuctionAveragePrice.description: The average price of the vehicle at the time of acquisition at auction

MMRAcquisitionAuctionCleanPrice.description: The clean price of the vehicle at the time of acquisition at auction

MMRAcquisitionRetailAveragePrice.description: The average retail price of the vehicle at the time of acquisition

MMRAcquisitonRetailCleanPrice.description: The clean retail price of the vehicle at the time of acquisition

MMRCurrentAuctionAveragePrice.description: The current average price of the vehicle at auction

MMRCurrentAuctionCleanPrice.description: The current clean price of the vehicle at auction

MMRCurrentRetailAveragePrice.description: The current average retail price of the vehicle

MMRCurrentRetailCleanPrice.description: The current clean retail price of the vehicle

VehBCost.description: The acquisition cost of the vehicle plus any additional expenses

WarrantyCost.description: The cost of warranty for the vehicle

Auction.description: The auction where the vehicle was purchased

value_dict.MANHEIM: The vehicle was purchased from Manheim auction
value_dict.ADESA: The vehicle was purchased from Adesa auction
value_dict.OTHER: The vehicle was purchased from other auctions

Trim.description: The trim level of the vehicle

Transmission.description: The type of transmission in the vehicle

value_dict.AUTO: The vehicle has an automatic transmission
value_dict.MANUAL: The vehicle has a manual transmission
value_dict.Manual: The vehicle has a manual transmission

WheelTypeID.description: The ID of the type of wheels on the vehicle

WheelType.description: The type of wheels on the vehicle

value_dict.Covers: The vehicle has covers on the wheels
value_dict.Special: The vehicle has special type wheels

Nationality.description: The nationality of the manufacturer of the vehicle

value_dict.AMERICAN: The vehicle is manufactured by an American company
value_dict.'OTHER ASIAN': The vehicle is manufactured by an Asian company other than top line
value_dict.'TOP LINE ASIAN': The vehicle is manufactured by a top line Asian company
value_dict.OTHER: The vehicle is manufactured by a company of other nationality

Size.description: The size category of the vehicle

TopThreeAmericanName.description: Whether the manufacturer is in the top three American manufacturers

value_dict.CHRYSLER: The vehicle is manufactured by Chrysler
value_dict.FORD: The vehicle is manufactured by Ford
value_dict.GM: The vehicle is manufactured by General Motors
value_dict.OTHER: The vehicle is manufactured by a company other than Chrysler, Ford, and GM

VNZIP1.description: The ZIP code of the location where the vehicle was sold

VNST.description: The state where the vehicle was sold

IsOnlineSale.description: Whether the sale was made online

value_dict.0: The vehicle was not sold online

Class.description: If the car purchased at the Auction is a bad buy (1 = bad buy; 0 = good buy)
